desc.p: Profit loss category for discount posting.
Defaulted from SAFECUSTODY.VALUES but can be overridden.
Accepts only Yes/Null. When set as Yes, system will post an adjusted entry and if set as Null, the system will post as per the definition set in SEC.ACC.MASTER. Refer field FEE.ADJUSTMENT.TYPE.
The value date of the posting is set here. This field can be input only if ADJUST.FEES is set as YES.
